Yes, there is.

ta-da!

Different mod but it'll help a lot with having jet flameout being synchronized.

Aye, I use it and it does help alot. While it does improve asymmetrical all together flameout, it doesn't resolve the issue where the engines on one side force a throttle down. I don't know if this issue is a result of intake air directly, or in-game thrust limitations based on speed/height. More likely the ladder.

You can set something like "Jet safety level" in MJ, which iirc is the margin of intake air above what the engines are needing it'll try and maintain by throttling.

Even at zero (heck I've tried negative values) it throttles down wayyy too soon.
